articles.title: YouTube Shorts to integrate Veo, Google’s AI video model - TechCrunch
articles.description: The main attraction of YouTube’s Made On YouTube event on Wednesday morning was, you guessed it, artificial intelligence. The company announced that it is YouTube is integrating Google DeepMind's AI model, Veo, into YouTube Shorts to help generate video backg…
